title: Galaxy Digital Price Targets Hiked Across Street Following Record 3Q Earnings
contentSnippet: Cantor, Canaccord and Benchmark all raised their Galaxy price objectives.

title: Why Bitcoin Volatility Remains Sticky While S&P 500's VIX Reverses October 10 Surge
contentSnippet: The relative richness of BTC's implied volatility stems from host of factors, including newfound pain points like ADL and liquidity issues.

title: Arthur Hayes calls for $1M Bitcoin as new Japan PM orders economic stimulus
contentSnippet: Hayes previously predicted that Bitcoin’s price would soar to $250,000 when the Bank of Japan pivoted to quantitative easing measures.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Zcash Surges to Lead Altcoin Market as Bitcoin Stalls Near $108K
contentSnippet: While bitcoin and ether continue to trade within tight ranges, Zcash (ZEC) has extended its extraordinary rally, now up more than 460% in a month.

title: CRYPTO FALLS, FED CRYPTO CONFERENCE TODAY, COINBASE ACQUIRES ECHO
contentSnippet: Crypto Dips Despite Continue Strength in Stocks. Another $320m of Liquidations in Drop. Fed to Host Crypto Innovation Conference Today. Strategy Bought $19m Btc, Bitmine Buys $251m Eth. Coinbase Buys

title: Stablecoins quietly become gaming’s hidden engine: BGA report
contentSnippet: A new BGA report revealed that, unlike volatile play-to-earn tokens, stablecoins offer predictability, giving game studios a steadier path to long-term growth.

title: FalconX acquires world’s largest crypto ETP issuer 21Shares
contentSnippet: The acquisition marks FalconX’s third major deal of 2025, following its purchases of crypto derivatives platform Arbelos Markets and a majority stake in Monarq.

title: Asian Stock Exchanges Slam Door on Bitcoin Treasury Companies
contentSnippet: Major Asian exchanges are pushing back on Bitcoin treasury models as companies globally follow Strategy’s Bitcoin playbook.

title: ソラナ（SOL）現物ETF、香港で初承認　10月27日取引開始
contentSnippet: 香港証券監督委員会がアジア初となるソラナ現物ETFを承認。ChinaAMC運用（香港）で10月27日取引開始。ビットコイン、イーサリアムに続く3番目の仮想通貨ETFとして、米国市場に先駆けた上場となる。

title: Zcash Thrives as Market Fear Hits 3-Month Peak: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 22, 2025

title: Why Some Bitcoin Whales Are Converting Their BTC Into Spot ETF Shares: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Large holders are reportedly swapping BTC into spot ETF shares without selling, making it easier to borrow against or include in estate plans.

title: Hong Kong SFC Clears City's First Spot Solana ETF
contentSnippet: The new exchange-traded fund marks Hong Kong’s latest step to widen crypto access under its highly-regulated market framework.

title: Bitcoin’s MVRV Ratio hints at ‘cyclical bottom’ forming below $110K
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s valuation indicator showed BTC entering an “undervaluation phase” and a potential local bottom, pointing to a near-term price rebound.

title: APAC's Biggest Stock Exchanges Push Back Against Digital Asset Treasury Strategies: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing has challenged at least five companies over plans to buy and hoard large amounts of cryptoassets

title: Prediction markets hit new high as Polymarket enters Sam Altman’s World
contentSnippet: World’s Polymarket Mini App integration came amid prediction markets surging past 2024 records, with $2 billion in weekly trading volumes.

title: $19B market crash paves way for Bitcoin’s rise to $200K: Standard Chartered
contentSnippet: The $19 billion market crash may be a buying opportunity as dust settles in the coming weeks, Standard Chartered’s Geoff Kendrick told Cointelegraph in an exclusive interview.

title: How to find coins before they get listed on Binance or Coinbase
contentSnippet: AI tools, onchain data and community signals are influencing how traders spot tokens before they hit major exchanges.

title: Crypto Prime Broker FalconX to Buy ETF Provider 21Shares: WSJ
contentSnippet: The deal, terms of which were not disclosed, will allow FalconX to expand beyond market making and liquidity services into issuing crypto ETFs.

title: Coinbase Is Building Private Transactions for Base, CEO Brian Armstrong Says
contentSnippet: The move is part of Coinbase's effort to prioritize privacy, which was bolstered by its March 2025 acquisition of the team behind Iron Fish.

title: DePIN-Powered AIOZ Network ‘Evolving a People‑Powered Internet’
contentSnippet: AIOZ Network is aiming to tackle issues holding consumers and businesses back across storage, streaming and AI.

title: Deribit, Komainu Join Forces for Institutional In-Custody Crypto Trading
contentSnippet: The deal gives institutions 24/7 trading access while keeping assets in segregated custody wallets

title: Bitcoin Fear and Greed Index May Signal Prolonged Market Anxiety
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment has remained at "fear" levels for a week as bitcoin consolidates, hinting at potential market exhaustion.

title: Sen. Lummis Pushes US Regulator to Finalize Open Banking Rule Backing Crypto
contentSnippet: The Senator warned banks have weaponized account access against crypto firms, urging the CFPB to finalize the rule “as soon as possible."

title: Hong Kong approves its first spot Solana ETF ahead of US
contentSnippet: Hong Kong joins Canada, Brazil and Kazakhstan in approving a spot Solana ETF, further widening the gap with the US, which has yet to authorize one.

title: Fake social media accounts: The rise of Cointelegraph impersonators, explained
contentSnippet: Fake “Cointelegraph” accounts are scamming crypto users. Learn how to spot impostors, verify identities and stay protected in 2025.

title: 仮想通貨取引、米国で前年比50%増　トランプ効果鮮明に＝2025上半期報告
contentSnippet: TRMラボの最新報告書によると、トランプ政権下で米国の仮想通貨取引高が50%増の1兆ドル超に。日本は普及ランキング9位に上昇。ステーブルコインは前年比83%増で過去最高を記録。

title: 金融審議会、暗号資産のインサイダー取引規制と銀行の取扱要件が焦点に
contentSnippet: 金融審議会が暗号資産のインサイダー取引規制案を提示。DEX・P2P取引も対象に。銀行本体の取扱いは慎重に検討する一方、子会社には門戸を開く方針。無登録業者への罰則も強化へ。

title: Why most ‘crypto cities’ flop — and the blueprint execs say might work
contentSnippet: Crypto executives argue that a self-sovereign city powered by cryptographic and decentralized systems is technically possible but would be immensely challenging.

title: 「量子コンピュータはビットコインの最大リスク」、CoinMetrics共同創設者が警告
contentSnippet: CoinMetrics共同創業者ニック・カーター氏が、量子コンピュータがビットコインの暗号セキュリティに及ぼす脅威について警告する論説を発表。ビットコインのセキュリティの仕組みについて解説し、量子技術の進化が現在の状況を変える可能性があると指摘した。

title: リミックスポイント、米ビットワイズのBTC保有企業ETFに新規採用
contentSnippet: ビットワイズが3月から提供する「OWNB」ETFに、日本企業メタプラネット、リミックスポイント、ネクソンも組み入れられている。

title: ビットコインL2「Arkade」ベータ版公開、BTC上のステーブルコインや貸借の基盤に
contentSnippet: Ark LabsがビットコインL2「Arkade」のベータ版を公開した。オフチェーンでステーブルコインやレンディング機能を実現し、ライトニングネットワークを補完する新基盤を目指す。

title: 米国初で百貨店チェーンが仮想通貨決済導入、創業110年の「Bealls」
contentSnippet: 創業110年の米百貨店チェーンBeallsが仮想通貨決済を導入。Flexa経由でビットコイン、イーサリアムなどに対応。全米初、複数ブロックチェーンから同時決済を受け入れる小売業者に。

title: 「Saga」スマホ、発売から2年でサポート終了　次世代端末「シーカー」へ移行
contentSnippet: ソラナ・モバイルが仮想通貨スマホ「サガ」のサポートを発売から2年で終了。2万台の完売を成し遂げ、ミームコインのエアドロップで注目を集めた。同社は現在、第2世代端末「シーカー」に注力し、15万台以上の予約を獲得している。

title: Man Earns $5.8K in Ethereum, Gets Three Years' Probation
contentSnippet: A former engineer has pled guilty to using his former employer’s cloud servers to mine crypto, costing the company over $45,000 in fees.

title: 'Uptober' Falters as Bitcoin and Ethereum Slip, Solana Leads Double-Digit Declines
contentSnippet: Analysts say 'Uptober' is canceled as Bitcoin and major altcoins slide amid a highly uncertain and volatile environment.

title: イーサリアム『フサカ』、取引のガス上限を導入
contentSnippet: イーサリアムは次期アップグレード「フサカ」でEIP-7825を導入し、1取引あたりのガス上限を約1678万に制限する。ホレスキーとセポリアで既に稼働しており、12月3日のメインネット実装を予定している。

title: イーサリアム元開発者が財団批判　ヴィタリックの影響力と支配層の存在を指摘
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨イーサリアムの元コア開発者シラージ氏がイーサリアム財団の体制を批判。ヴィタリック氏を中心とした支配層の存在や報酬格差を指摘し、ポリゴンCEOも不満を表明した。

title: OpenAI’s Sora 2 Can Fabricate Convincing Deepfakes on Command, Study Finds
contentSnippet: Researchers found Sora 2 can produce realistic deepfake videos spreading false claims with little effort, intensifying scrutiny of its safety controls.

title: Why Google Shouldn’t Worry About OpenAI’s Atlas Browser—Yet
contentSnippet: OpenAI’s Atlas release to macOS on Tuesday marks a pivotal moment in web search, but should Google be concerned?

title: 'Oh Fuck': Solana Meme Coin Refunds Investors—A Year After Accidentally Burning $10 Million
contentSnippet: Solana meme coin investors have been refunded for the SOL they sent to the Slerf pre-sale wallet, which was mistakenly burned 19 months ago.
